name: Chef's Special Recipe
text: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated while you control a "Nouvelles" Ritual Monster: Negate the activation, then you can destroy that card if you control a monster that was Special Summoned by the effect of a "Nouvelles" monster. If you Special Summon "Hungry Burger": You can banish this card from your GY; Tribute as many monsters your opponent controls as possible. You can only use each effect of "Chef's Special Recipe" once per turn.
